long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Frameless App for standalone access to Amazon.com.

* No Browser Elements! - Not even a frame border.
* Edges resize.
* Remembers location.
* Control buttons in the upper right:
   - Close
   - Always-On-Top (toggle)
   - Drag (double-click to toggle fullscreen)

** Disclaimer ** Amazon is a registered trademark, this webapp is not affiliated with Amazon.

Changelog:
v0.1.2
*Updated HTTP links to more secure HTTPS
*Updated default icon
